detectors.description: Contract Core_Finance_V4 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core_Finance_V4.sol#14-75) is not in CapWords

Core_Finance_V4.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core_Finance_V4.sol#14-75) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 100000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core_Finance_V4.sol#16)
detectors.markdown:
[Core_Finance_V4.slitherConstructorVariables()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core_Finance_V4.sol#L14-L75) uses literals with too many digits:
